sanPhams.name: Hydro Flask Wide Mouth Water Bottle
sanPhams.description: Stay hydrated throughout your day with this durable and stylish water bottle. Keeps drinks cold for hours and hot for even longer, perfect for workouts, hikes, or everyday use.

sanPhams.description: Blast away dirt, grime, and mildew with this powerful pressure washer. Featuring a 1,800 PSI motor, multiple spray nozzles, and a detergent injector, it's perfect for cleaning cars, decks, patios, and more.

sanPhams.name: Rode NT-USB Mini Condenser Microphone
sanPhams.description: Capture studio-quality audio for podcasts, streaming, and music creation. Sleek and compact design with easy USB connectivity makes it perfect for any setup.

sanPhams.name: Monocle magazine
sanPhams.description: Explore global cities, discover emerging trends, and embrace a refined lifestyle with Monocle. This beautifully designed magazine delves into design, architecture, travel, and business, offering a curated perspective on the world's most innovative places and ideas.
